content:
I'm getting a failure -- http://build.fhir.org/ig/saulakravitz/vrdr-fsh/branches/July24-corrected/failure/build.log

This appears to be the error, which doesn't give me much to hang my hat on:

org.hl7.fhir.exceptions.FHIRFormatError: Unknown Content value @  START_TAG seen ...://snomed.info/sct">\n      <value value="http://snomed.info/sct"/>... @6:46
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.formats.XmlParserBase.unknownContent(XmlParserBase.java:324)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.formats.XmlParser.parseUri(XmlParser.java:217)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.formats.XmlParser.parseCodingContent(XmlParser.java:1017)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.formats.XmlParser.parseCoding(XmlParser.java:1006)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.formats.XmlParser.parseCodeableConceptContent(XmlParser.java:1669)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.formats.XmlParser.parseCodeableConcept(XmlParser.java:1658)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.formats.XmlParser.parseType(XmlParser.java:24258)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.formats.XmlParserBase.parseType(XmlParserBase.java:157)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.formats.ParserBase.parseType(ParserBase.java:74)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r4.formats.ParserBase.parseType(ParserBase.java:65)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher$TypeParserR4.parseType(Publisher.java:484)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.utils.ElementWrappers$BaseWrapperMetaElement.getBase(ElementWrappers.java:68)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.ProfileDrivenRenderer.isDefaultValue(ProfileDrivenRenderer.java:941)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.ProfileDrivenRenderer.generateElementByProfile(ProfileDrivenRenderer.java:686)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.ProfileDrivenRenderer.generateByProfile(ProfileDrivenRenderer.java:657)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.ProfileDrivenRenderer.render(ProfileDrivenRenderer.java:115)
    at org.hl7.fhir.r5.renderers.ResourceRenderer.render(ResourceRenderer.java:84)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.generateNarratives(Publisher.java:1180)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.loadConformance(Publisher.java:3921)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.createIg(Publisher.java:897)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.execute(Publisher.java:752)
    at org.hl7.fhir.igtools.publisher.Publisher.main(Publisher.java:8664)
Publishing Content Failed: Unknown Content value @  START_TAG seen ...<system>\n      <value value="http://snomed.info/sct"/>... @6:46 (00:33.0362)
oops. oversight on my part. You have some illegal content somewhere, but that sure makes it hard to figure out where.

2 obvious questions:
1) what does illegal mean?
2) when does next version emerge and provide salvation?

THANK YOU
your resource has a <value in it somewhere it shouldn't
